snippet: Frank Schleck, who finished third in the Tour de France last year, was said to have tested positive for the banned diuretic Xipamide after Stage 13 on Saturday.
abstract: Radioshack-Nissan-Trek team withdraws cyclist Frank Schleck from the Tour de France after he tests positive for the banned diuretic Xipamide after Stage 13; this is the first time Schleck has tested positive for a banned substance, but he has long been dogged by doping controversy.
lead_paragraph: Frank Schleck, who finished third in the Tour de France last year, was said to have tested positive for the banned diuretic Xipamide after Stage 13 on Saturday.

headline.seo: Tour de France — Frank Schleck Tests Positive and Withdraws
headline.main: Frank Schleck Withdraws After Positive Test
headline.print_headline: Frank Schleck Out After Positive Test
